name: Wizard Duel (theinstagrahame)
description:
You are a wizard.

You have a Grimoire that contains Arcane Words of Power. 

You can add to this Grimoire from Scraps you find in the world around you, or by winning Wizard Duels against others with Grimoires.

---

To create your Grimoire, you need:

  • This RPG
  • Pencil and paper
  • Other business cards

Note: This business card RPG can be used with any business cards or other business card games you may acquire. 

To duel another Wizard, you need:

  • Your Grimoire
  • Another wizard
  • Someone to act as an impartial judge.
